title: Your stars today
text:
See what the stars have in store for you today.

MONDAY OCTOBER 28, 2019

ARIES March 21-April 20 ***

The New Moon indicates a new phase involving joint finances or an intimate relationship. Be careful with the changes you make though. Don’t throw the baby out with the bath water!

TAURUS April 21-May 21 ***

Are you stuck in a romantic slump? Or have your platonic partnerships become boring? The New Moon and Uranus push you to shake things up and make your relationships much more satisfying.

GEMINI May 22-June 21 ***

It’s time to reboot your health and fitness, as the New Moon activates your wellbeing zone. You need to make nutritious food and regular exercise an essential part of your daily routine.

CANCER June 22-July 23 ***

Courtesy of the New Moon, prepare for a period of nurturing old friendships and establishing new ones. You also need to shake up your peer group and remove fake friends from your life ASAP.

LEO July 24-Aug 23 **

Family life looks frustrating as the New Moon, Saturn and Uranus signal sudden changes in your Lion’s den. The more willingly you embrace these modifications, the less disruptive life will be.

VIRGO Aug 24-Sep 23 ***

Is your busy mind suffering from information overload? Aim for a digital detox and a mental spring-clean, as you adapt to new ways of thinking and find fresh solutions to stubborn old problems.

LIBRA Sep 24-Oct 23 ***

Keep an open mind, as you absorb new financial information. The New Moon indicates a possible increase in cash flow. But don’t cancel that out by indulging in a spontaneous shopping spree!

SCORPIO Oct 24-Nov 22 ***

You’re at your magnetic best, as the New Moon lights up your sign. If you communicate clearly with others, then you’ll make progress. But resist the temptation to be possessive or manipulative.

SAGITTARIUS Nov 23-Dec 21 ***

Sagittarians are gregarious souls who love to party. But the New Moon falls in your privacy zone. So aim for some splendid solitude at the moment, as you relax and regenerate from within.

CAPRICORN Dec 22-Jan 20 ***

With the New Moon visiting your hopes and wishes zone, strive to be more creative with your Capricorn dreams and aspirations. And resist the urge to be critical or controlling with others.

AQUARIUS Jan 21-Feb 19 **

It’s time to create work opportunities and maximise your professional potential, as the New Moon stimulates your career zone. But if you rush things, you could arouse opposition in others.

PISCES Feb 20-March 20 ****

Imagination, creativity and a sense of wonder are high today as you go on a grand adventure in your mind. Plus do your best to be kind and compassionate towards someone who’s in need.

YOUR DAY

The New Moon is the time to wipe the slate clean and start again.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY

You are curious but you can also be very demanding. If you learn how to wind down and relax, then it will help to balance your moods.

Copyright Joanne Madeline Moore 2019
description: See what the stars have in store for you today.
